conclusion: Objects A and B are moved through the air and placed down at the location of objects A, B, C, and D.
Due to gravity, objects A and B will fall and come into contact with objects A, B, C, and D.
The force of objects A and B falling will push objects A, B, C, and D to the right.
Objects A, B, C, and D will be displaced to the right due to the force exerted by objects A and B.
